what_you_do: Founder of the Owwll App, a social networking app designed to connect professionals and monetize expertise.
who_you_serve: Professionals, CEOs, and entrepreneurs seeking to connect, learn, and grow their expertise.
social_proof: Featured in Wall Street Journal, Forbes, VoyageMIA, and Investopedia. Bachelors Degree in Finance from the University of Delaware. Financial Services Specialist designation from the American College.
business_focus: Connecting professionals through a social networking app that enables users to monetize their expertise via 1-on-1 advice.
service_provided: Professional networking app, 1-on-1 expert advice platform, podcast
